CustomField.description: When used in tandem with "Is Default Filter", it also controls whether the Exclude toggles displays for the Product Package table. This field should have the same configuration across all statistic configurations that share an Exposure Type.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Administrators manually select this optional checkbox field. It controls whether excluded loans and debts should be removed from the exposure calculation.
CustomField.label: Enable Exclusion 2
